name: half n half infinity scarf
notes:
**find the free version of this pattern [here][1]!**

the half n half infinity scarf - the best of both worlds. 

why pick one color when you could have two? the half n half infinity scarf uses two different colors in a color block style, giving you the best of both worlds because you can easily style it to showcase whichever you're in the mood for! with a beautiful texture and endless versatility, this scarf will quickly become a go-to accessory in your fall and winter wardrobe. 

curl up on the couch, turn on the tv, and get lost in this super relaxing project. the half n half infinity scarf is the perfect for the beginner crocheter or anyone looking for a fun and easy project. 

visit www.woodsandwool.com for the free version of this pattern.

pattern + download
- please note this listing is for a pattern only.
- pattern is written in us terms.
- this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file (pdf) upon purchase.

skill level
- crochet pattern
- this pattern is beginner-friendly, but does require some knowledge of basic stitches and pattern reading.  

yarn
- this pattern uses 400 yards of worsted weight yarn (200 yards of each color). try out the super soft tweed yarn recommended for this pattern, or grab something from your stash!

copyright 
the half n half infinity scarf pattern and photographs are property of woods and wool and are for personal, non-commercial use only. you may not alter, share, or sell this pattern in any way. however, you are more than welcome to sell the finished product. please credit woods and wool by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online.

share your work 
tag @woodsandwool and use the #halfnhalfinfinityscarf hashtag to show off your beautiful new scarf!


  [1]: https://www.woodsandwool.com/free-crochet-pattern-half-n-half-infinity-scarf/
